addAddress.header.defaultMessage: To add a new entry to your addressbook, you need the network address of the account and can supply an optional description. Once added it will reflect in your address book.

addAddress.input.address.hint.defaultMessage: the network address for the entry

addAddress.input.name.hint.defaultMessage: a descriptive name for the entry

addAddress.input.description.hint.defaultMessage: an expanded description for the entry

dapps.add.local.desc.defaultMessage: All applications installed locally on the machine by the user for access by the Parity client.

dapps.add.builtin.desc.defaultMessage: Experimental applications developed by the Parity team to show off dapp capabilities, integration, experimental features and to control certain network-wide client behaviour.

dapps.add.network.desc.defaultMessage: These applications are not affiliated with Parity nor are they published by Parity. Each remain under the control of their respective authors. Please ensure that you understand the goals for each application before interacting.

createAccount.accountDetails.address.hin.defaultMessage: the network address for the account

createAccount.accountDetails.phrase.back.defaultMessage: Type "I have written down the phrase" below to confirm it is backed up.
Please back up the recovery phrase now. Make sure to keep it private and secure, it allows full and unlimited access to the account.

createAccount.accountDetailsGeth.importe.defaultMessage: You have completed the import of {number} addresses from the Geth keystore. These will now be available in your accounts list as a normal account, along with their associated balances on the network.

createAccount.creationType.fromNew.descr.defaultMessage: Selecting your identity icon and specifying the password

createAccount.creationType.fromQr.descri.defaultMessage: Attach an externally managed account via QR code

createAccount.creationType.fromGeth.desc.defaultMessage: Import accounts from the Geth keystore with the original password

createAccount.creationType.fromJSON.desc.defaultMessage: Import an industry-standard JSON keyfile with the original password

createAccount.creationType.fromRaw.descr.defaultMessage: Enter a previously created raw private key with a new password

createAccount.creationType.fromPresale.d.defaultMessage: Import an Ethereum presale wallet file with the original password

createAccount.creationType.info.defaultMessage: Please select the type of account you want to create. Either create an account via name & password, or import it from a variety of existing sources. From here the wizard will guide you through the process of completing your account creation.

errors.noFile.defaultMessage: select a valid wallet file to import

errors.noKey.defaultMessage: you need to provide the raw private key

errors.noMatchPassword.defaultMessage: the supplied passwords does not match

errors.noMatchBackupPhrase.defaultMessage: the supplied recovery phrase does not match

errors.noMatchPhraseBackedUp.defaultMessage: type "I have written down the phrase"

errors.noName.defaultMessage: you need to specify a valid name

errors.invalidKey.defaultMessage: the raw key needs to be hex, 64 characters in length and contain the prefix "0x"

createAccount.newAccount.name.hint.defaultMessage: a descriptive name for the account

createAccount.newAccount.hint.hint.defaultMessage: (optional) a hint to help with remembering the password

createAccount.newGeth.available.defaultMessage: There are currently {count} importable keys available from the Geth keystore which are not already available on your Parity instance. Select the accounts you wish to import and move to the next step to complete the import.

createAccount.newGeth.noKeys.defaultMessage: There are currently no importable keys available from the Geth keystore, which are not already available on your Parity instance

createAccount.newImport.name.hint.defaultMessage: a descriptive name for the account

createAccount.newImport.hint.hint.defaultMessage: (optional) a hint to help with remembering the password

createAccount.newImport.password.hint.defaultMessage: the password to unlock the wallet

createAccount.newQr.address.hint.defaultMessage: the network address for the account

createAccount.newQr.name.hint.defaultMessage: a descriptive name for the account

createAccount.newQr.summary.defaultMessage: Use the built-in machine camera to scan to QR code of the account you wish to attach as an external account. External accounts are signed on the external device.

createAccount.rawKey.private.hint.defaultMessage: the raw hex encoded private key

createAccount.rawKey.name.hint.defaultMessage: a descriptive name for the account

createAccount.rawKey.hint.hint.defaultMessage: (optional) a hint to help with remembering the password

createAccount.recoveryPhrase.name.hint.defaultMessage: a descriptive name for the account

createAccount.recoveryPhrase.hint.hint.defaultMessage: (optional) a hint to help with remembering the password

createAccount.recoveryPhrase.windowsKey..defaultMessage: Key was created with Parity <1.4.5 on Windows

createAccount.recoveryPhrase.warning.emp.defaultMessage:
The recovery phrase is empty.
                This account can be recovered by anyone.

createAccount.recoveryPhrase.warning.tes.defaultMessage:
The recovery phrase is empty.
                This account can be recovered by anyone.
                Proceed with caution.

createAccount.recoveryPhrase.warning.sho.defaultMessage:
The recovery phrase is less than 11 words.
                This account has not been generated by Parity and might be insecure.
                Proceed with caution.

shapeshift.awaitingDepositStep.awaitingC.defaultMessage: Awaiting confirmation of the deposit address for your {typeSymbol} funds exchange

shapeshift.awaitingDepositStep.awaitingD.defaultMessage: {shapeshiftLink} is awaiting a {typeSymbol} deposit. Send the funds from your {typeSymbol} network client to -

shapeshift.awaitingExchangeStep.awaiting.defaultMessage: Awaiting the completion of the funds exchange and transfer of funds to your Parity account.

shapeshift.completedStep.parityFunds.defaultMessage: The change in funds will be reflected in your Parity account shortly.

shapeshift.errorStep.info.defaultMessage: The funds shifting via {shapeshiftLink} failed with a fatal error on the exchange. The error message received from the exchange is as follow:

shapeshift.optionsStep.noPairs.defaultMessage: There are currently no exchange pairs/coins available to fund with.

shapeshift.optionsStep.typeSelect.hint.defaultMessage: the type of crypto conversion to do

shapeshift.optionsStep.returnAddr.hint.defaultMessage: the return address for send failures

shapeshift.optionsStep.terms.label.defaultMessage: I understand that ShapeShift.io is a 3rd-party service and by using the service any transfer of information and/or funds is completely out of the control of Parity

transfer.details.amount.hint.defaultMessage: the amount to transfer to the recipient

transfer.advanced.data.hint.defaultMessage: the data to pass through with the transaction

transfer.warning.wallet_spent_limit.defaultMessage: This transaction value is above the remaining daily limit. It will need to be confirmed by other owners.

upgradeParity.busy.defaultMessage: Your upgrade to Parity {newversion} is currently in progress. Please wait until the process completes.

upgradeParity.completed.defaultMessage: Your upgrade to Parity {newversion} has been successfully completed. Click "done" to automatically reload the application.

upgradeParity.failed.defaultMessage: Your upgrade to Parity {newversion} has failed with an error.

upgradeParity.info.welcome.defaultMessage: Welcome to the Parity upgrade wizard, allowing you a completely seamless upgrade experience to the next version of Parity.

upgradeParity.info.upgrade.defaultMessage: An upgrade to version {newversion} is available

upgradeParity.info.next.defaultMessage: Proceed with "upgrade now" to start your Parity upgrade.

upgradeParity.consensus.capable.defaultMessage: Your current Parity version is capable of handling the network requirements.

upgradeParity.consensus.capableUntil.defaultMessage: Your current Parity version is capable of handling the network requirements until block {blockNumber}

upgradeParity.consensus.incapableSince.defaultMessage: Your current Parity version is incapable of handling the network requirements since block {blockNumber}

upgradeParity.consensus.unknown.defaultMessage: Your current Parity version is capable of handling the network requirements.

vaults.selector.noneAvailable.defaultMessage: There are currently no vaults opened and available for selection. Create and open some first before attempting to select a vault for an account move.

vaults.confirmOpen.info.defaultMessage: You are about to open a vault. After confirming your password, all accounts associated with this vault will be visible. Closing the vault will remove the accounts from view until the vault is opened again.

vaults.confirmOpen.password.hint.defaultMessage: the password specified when creating the vault

walletSettings.edit.message.defaultMessage:
In order to edit this contract's settings, at
                  least {owners, number} {owners, plural, one {owner } other {owners }} have to
                  send the very same modifications. You can paste a stringified version
                  of the modifications here.

walletSettings.changes.none.defaultMessage: No modifications have been made to the Wallet settings.

For your modifications to be taken into account,

txEditor.gas.info.defaultMessage: You can choose the gas price based on the distribution of recent included transaction gas prices. The lower the gas price is, the cheaper the transaction will be. The higher the gas price is, the faster it should get mined by the network.

txEditor.condition.date.hint.defaultMessage: The minimum date to send from

accounts.tooltip.overview.defaultMessage: your accounts are visible for easy access, allowing you to edit the meta information, make transfers, view transactions and fund the account

accounts.tooltip.actions.defaultMessage: actions relating to the current view are available on the toolbar for quick access, be it for performing actions or creating a new item

address.delete.confirmInfo.defaultMessage: Are you sure you want to remove the following address from your addressbook?

settings.background.overview_0.defaultMessage: The background pattern you can see right now is unique to your Parity installation. It will change every time you create a new Signer token. This is so that decentralized applications cannot pretend to be trustworthy.

settings.background.overview_1.defaultMessage: Pick a pattern you like and memorize it. This Pattern will always be shown from now on, unless you clear your browser cache or use a new Signer token.

settings.parity.overview_0.defaultMessage: Control the Parity node settings and nature of syncing via this interface.

settings.parity.modes.hint.defaultMessage: the syncing mode for the Parity node

settings.parity.modes.mode_passive.defaultMessage: Parity syncs initially, then sleeps and wakes regularly to resync

settings.parity.modes.mode_dark.defaultMessage: Parity syncs only when the RPC is active

settings.parity.chains.hint.defaultMessage: the chain for the Parity node to sync to

settings.parity.chains.chain_foundation.defaultMessage: Parity syncs to the Ethereum network launched by the Ethereum Foundation

settings.parity.chains.chain_kovan.defaultMessage: Parity syncs to the Kovan test network

settings.parity.chains.chain_olympic.defaultMessage: Parity syncs to the Olympic test network

settings.parity.chains.cmorden_kovan.defaultMessage: Parity syncs to Morden (Classic) test network

settings.parity.chains.chain_ropsten.defaultMessage: Parity syncs to the Ropsten test network

settings.parity.chains.chain_classic.defaultMessage: Parity syncs to the Ethereum Classic network

settings.parity.chains.chain_expanse.defaultMessage: Parity syncs to the Expanse network

settings.parity.chains.chain_dev.defaultMessage: Parity uses a local development chain

settings.proxy.overview_0.defaultMessage: The proxy setup allows you to access Parity and all associated decentralized applications via memorable addresses.

settings.proxy.details_0.defaultMessage: Instead of accessing Parity via the IP address and port, you will be able to access it via the .web3.site subdomain, by visiting {homeProxy}. To setup subdomain-based routing, you need to add the relevant proxy entries to your browser,

settings.proxy.details_1.defaultMessage: To learn how to configure the proxy, instructions are provided for {windowsLink}, {macOSLink} or {ubuntuLink}.

settings.views.overview_0.defaultMessage: Manage the available application views using only the parts of the application applicable to you.

settings.views.overview_1.defaultMessage: Are you an end-user? The defaults are setup for both beginner and advanced users alike.

settings.views.overview_3.defaultMessage: Are you a miner or run a large-scale node? Add the features to give you all the information needed to watch the node operation.

settings.views.accounts.description.defaultMessage: A list of all the accounts associated with and imported into this Parity instance. Send transactions, receive incoming values, manage your balances and fund your accounts.

settings.views.addresses.description.defaultMessage: A list of all contacts and address book entries managed by this Parity instance. Watch accounts and have the details available at the click of a button when transacting.

settings.views.settings.description.defaultMessage: This view. Allows you to customize the application in term of options, operation and look and feel.

status.debug.stopped.defaultMessage: Refresh and display of logs from Parity is currently stopped via the UI, start it to see the latest updates.

status.miningSettings.input.gasFloor.hin.defaultMessage: the gas floor target for mining
